message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR 

This paper deals with object recognition using deep convolutional neural networks and proposes a method to estimate the rotation path of an object to its best view for classification. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves the use of a mechanical system or robot, which suggests the sub-category cs.RO (Robotics). The use of deep learning techniques for classification falls under cs.LG (Machine Learning), and the estimation of viewpoint can be considered as a form of unsupervised learning, which is a sub-topic of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper involves the manipulation of 3D models, which can be categorized under cs.GR (Graphics).
